amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate regarding the implementation of the Prescription Drug and Medicare Improvement Act of 2003.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1027 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1027 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Snowe. (consideration: CR S8632-8633; text: CR S8633) To express the sense of the Senate regarding the implementation of the Prescription Drug and Medicare Improvement Act of 2003.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1027 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Snowe.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1027 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
